longBusinessSummary: Aarvee Denims and Exports Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of fabrics in India and internationally. It operates through two segments, Textile and Windmill. The company offers cotton fibers; cotton and texturized yarns; and denim and non-denim fabrics. It is also involved in the wind power generation business. The company was incorporated in 1988 and is headquartered in Ahmedabad, India.
